name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing scalable and secure applications using **Java**, **Spring**, and **REST** APIs, alongside a strong proficiency in **MySQL** for database management. I bring hands-on expertise in deploying applications using **Docker** and optimizing workflows through **CI/CD** practices, ensuring rapid and reliable software delivery. My experience in **AWS** enables me to implement cloud-native solutions that achieve high performance and availability.
In addition to my core skills, I have a comprehensive background in the healthcare and financial sectors, building high-performance solutions that comply with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My capabilities extend to integrating **ElasticStack** and **Elasticsearch** into applications for improved logging and search functionalities. I leverage Agile methodologies to foster collaborative development environments, and I am committed to driving innovation and efficiency in SaaS applications.
